text: Dorothy Lewis is a former female English international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== Lewis won a National Championship in 1985 when she won the pairs title with Pip Green. She represented England in the fours event, at the 1990 Commonwealth Games in Auckland, New Zealand. ==References== Category:Living people Category:English female bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1990 Commonwealth Games Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Dorothy Lewis (bowls)
